source.04a899b4:
import glob 
import os
import random
from IPython.core.display import HTML
source.e6f334af: lst = glob.glob('/kaggle/input/various-pokemon-image-dataset/ani/*.gif') random_select = random.choices(lst, k=50) for link in random_select: with open(link, 'rb') as r: with open(link.split('/')[-1],'wb') as w: w.write(r.read()) html = '' for idx, link in enumerate(random_select): if idx%10 == 0: html += ' ' link = link.split('/')[-1] html += f'' if idx%10 == 9: html += ' ' HTML(html)
